question: what is the aranka steyaert?
answer: With Master of Science (MSc) from Ghent University, Master of Science (MSc) from Norwegian University of Science and Technology (NTNU), Bachelor of Science (BS) from Ghent University, 7e jaar ASO from KA Voskenslaan, diploma ASO from Sint-Janscollege, Sint-Amandsberg, Aranka Steyaert has 5 yrs 2 mos of experience as a Phd-student at Ghent University in Gent, Vlaanderen, Belgi, 1 yr 7 mos of experience as a Leraar at Het Bijlesbureae in, 3 mos of experience as a Stage at Research Institute for Nature and Forest in Anderlecht, 1 mo of experience as a Jobstudent at Municipal mobility department in Destelbergen and is proficient in Statistische modellen, Machinaal leren, Rapportage en analyse, Oplossen van problemen, Statistiek, Wiskundige modellen, Bio-informatica (Bio-informatics), Photography, LaTeX, Java, R, SAS, Linux, Matlab, Python, C++, English, Frans, Algoritmen.
